content: For UK people.. NHS Digital are now moving into development stage of the CareConnect API. This is a RESTful API using the CareConnect Profiles intended for use in a number of care settings (including Acute, mental Health & Community). Discussions relating to this will be happening on the INTEROPen Ryver site. So if this is a development you are interested in then take a look https://interopen.ryver.com/index.html#forums/1093815
Alpha version of CareConnect FHIR API https://nhsconnect.github.io/CareConnectAPI/
Webex on the UK API can be found here: https://contattafiles.s3-us-west-1.amazonaws.com/tnt373/mlxxu5nNLjtC05F/CareConnect%20Phase%201%20Update-20170712%200958-1%20%281%29.mp4

An update on the Care Connect API work on December 8th via a webex, including:

  • Background to Care Connect and use of FHIR in the UK
  • The delivery of a Care Connect Reference Implementation, describing the key decision points in its development, the technology choices and how it could potentially be used going forwards
  • Details on the future development landscape for the Care Connect API

WebEx Dial-in Details - the webex will be recorded and made available after the event
JOIN MEETING
https://hscic.webex.com/hscic/j.php?MTID=me2c59b47ec1404d967ce8b9c40cc765e
Meeting number (access code): 955 531 854

JOIN BY PHONE
0203-478-5289 Call-in toll number (UK)

Global call-in numbers:
https://hscic.webex.com/hscic/globalcallin.php?serviceType=MC&ED=547342957&tollFree=0

Can't join the meeting? Contact support here:
https://hscic.webex.com/hscic/mc

Hi Marko,

Thanks for hosting the webex. I'm interested in CareConnect and the use of FHIR as i'm currently developing a telehealth app. It's a bit of a nightmare to get started with NHS software integration so I applaud anyone working on making the process more easy / transparent.

Best Wishes,

Chris
Hi Paul - Yes it was. We'll make sure we put a link on here in the next few days when it is available.

Hi Paul, please find a link to the session https://contattafiles.s3-us-west-1.amazonaws.com/tnt373/1QycsuftbBYVo_N/CareConnect-20171208%201201-1.mp4
